entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whati
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:16 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 60%
